data.quote: Ballot is stronger than the bullet.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: An unexamined life is worth living.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Maybe they hate me beacause I'm too good.
data.author: Christiano Ronaldo

data.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
data.author: Joe Kennedy

data.quote: Don’t wait for your feelings to change to take the action. Take the action and your feelings will change.
data.author: Barbara Baron

data.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
data.author: Booker T. Washington

data.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
data.author: Colin R. Davis

data.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
data.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

data.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction.
data.author: George Lorimer
